amendment.description: To provide funding for NASA aeronautics at the fiscal year 2007 levels.

vote.text: Amendment SA 620 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 620 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Warner. To provide funding for NASA aeronautics at the fiscal year 2007 levels.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 620 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Warner.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 620 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
